docs.lead_paragraph: Airplane noise is greater in the metropolitan area than in any other section of the country and it will probably get worse, a regional director of the Federal Aviation Administration said here yesterday.

headline.main: AIRPLANE NOISES EXPECTED TO RISE; U.S. Aide Urges Better Plan for Airport Neighborhoods

docs.abstract: conf; Bakke predicts noise problem will worsen; urges formation of regional planning bd to coordinate land development near airports; Hempstead Town Supervisor Caso and Deputy Mayor Costello urge research into ways to cut noise; several civic groups picket conf; threaten to shut Kennedy by blocking runways
docs.snippet: Airplane noise is greater in the metropolitan area than in any other section of the country and it will probably get worse, a regional director of the Federal Aviation Administration said here yesterday.
